bitfields.name: BOOT_CFG_LOCK
LOCK_CFG_LOCK
COM_DEVICE_ID0_LOCK
COM_DEVICE_ID1_LOCK
ELE_OTFAD1_KEY_LOCK
ELE_OEM_SRKH_LOCK
ELE_OTFAD2_KEY_LOCK
BOOT_MODE_FROM_FUSE
bitfields.description:
BOOT_MODE_FROM_FUSE
0-FlexSPI NOR
1-FlexSPI NAND
2-eMMC
3-SD
4-SEMC SLC raw NAND
5-Serial Boot

bitfields.name: RECOVERY_BOOT_EN
bitfields.description:
RECOVERY_BOOT_EN
0-Recovery boot is disabled
1-Recovery boot is enabled

bitfields.name: FORCE_BT_FROM_FUSE
bitfields.description:
FORCE_BT_FROM_FUSE
0-Boot mode determined by BOOT_MODE pins 
1-Boot mode determined by BOOT_MODE_FROM_FUSE

values.description: Boot mode determined by BOOT_MODE pins

bitfields.name: DIS_UART_DWNLD
bitfields.description:
DIS_UART_DWNLD
0-Enable UART in Serial Downloader
1-Disable UART in Serial Downloader

bitfields.name: DIS_SPI_DWNLD
bitfields.description:
DIS_SPI_DWNLD
0-Enable SPI in Serial Downloader
1-Disable SPI in Serial Downloader

bitfields.name: DIS_USB_HID_DWNLD
bitfields.description:
DIS_USB_HID_DWNLD
0-Enable USB in Serial Downloader
1-Disable USB in Serial Downloader

bitfields.name: DIS_INFINITE_LOOP
bitfields.description:
DIS_INFINITE_LOOP
0-Infinite loop is allowed
1-Infinite Loop is forbidden

bitfields.name: DIS_BT_MODE_API
bitfields.description:
DIS_BT_MODE_API
0-Allow boot from ROM API call
1-Disallow boot from ROM API call

values.name: Allow
values.description: Allow boot from ROM API call

values.name: Disallow
values.description: Disallow boot from ROM API call

bitfields.name: DIS_SERIAL_DWNLD
bitfields.description:
DIS_SERIAL_DWNLD
0-Allow Serial downloader mode
1-Disable Serial Downloader mode

bitfields.name: LPSPI_DUMMY_BYTES
bitfields.description:
LPSPI_DUMMY_BYTES
0-Default (4 cycles for dual/6 cycles for quad)n (non-zero) - 4n cycles for dual/2n cycles for quad

values.name: Default
values.description: Default (4 cycles for dual/6 cycles for quad)n (non-zero) - 4n cycles for dual/2n cycles for quad

bitfields.name: xSPI_NOR_PROBE_TYPE
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NOR_PROBE_TYPE(Non-0 only when xSPI_NOR_TYPE is 0)
0-JESD216
1-MXIC Octal
2-Micron Octal
3-Adesto Octal

bitfields.name: xSPI_NOR_CONNECTION_SEL
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NOR_CONNECTION_SEL
0-Connected via PORTA CS0
1-Connected via PORTB CS0

bitfields.name: xSPI_NOR_TYPE
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NOR_TYPE
0-Boot with default 0x03 Read
1-Reserved
2-HyperFLASH 1V8
3-HyperFLASH 3V0
4-MXIC Octal Read
5-Micron Octal DDR ReadOthers - Reserved

bitfields.name: RST_REQUIRED
bitfields.description:
RST_REQUIRED
Reset required after bootfailure. Set if xSPI_NOR_ ENCRYPT_XIP_EN is 1

bitfields.name: xSPI_NOR_RESET_TYPE
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NOR_RESET_TYPE(Non-0 only when xSPI_NOR_TYPE is 0)
0-Reset sequence is specified inFLASH_STATE_CTXRegister
1-Reset FLASH by ResetPin before access
2-Reset FLASH by JEDEC Hardware Reset flow
3-Typical ResetSequence (0x66, 0x99)

values.description: Reset FLASH by ResetPin before access
Reset FLASH by JEDEC Hardware Reset flow

bitfields.name: xSPI_NOR_ENCRYPT_XIP_EN
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NOR_ENCRYPT_XIP_EN
0-Encrypted XIP is disabled
1-Encrypted XIP is enabled

bitfields.name: DIS_xSPI_NOR_FCB
bitfields.description:
DIS_xSPI_NOR_FCB
0-Enable FLASH CFG Block
1-Disable FLASH CFG Block

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_PAD_SETTING_OVERRIDE
bitfields.description:
FLEXSPI_PAD_SETTING_OVERRIDE
0-Slew rate , 0: slow slew rate, 1: fast slew rate bit
1-Drive Strength, 0: normal driver, 1 : high driver bit
2-Pull selection, 0: pull off, 1 - Pull on

values.description: Slew rate , 0: slow slew rate, 1: fast slew rate bit
Drive Strength, 0: normal driver, 1 : high driver bit
Pull selection, 0: pull off, 1 - Pull on

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_PAD_OVERRIDE_EN
bitfields.description:
FLEXSPI_PAD_OVERRIDE_EN
0-Use default pad setting
1-Use the pad setting specified by FLEXSPI_PAD_SETTING_OVERRIDE FUSE field

values.description: Use the pad setting specified by FLEXSPI_PAD_SETTING_OVERRIDE FUSE field

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_PIN_SEL
bitfields.description:
FLEXSPI_RESET_PIN_SEL
Select the Reset Pin
0-Reset Pin 0
1-Reset Pin 1

bitfields.name: FLEXSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
bitfields.description:
FLEXSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
Zero - Use the Delay cell value calculated by ROM
Others - Use the Delay cell value in terms of 100ps

bitfields.name: xSPI_NAND_CS_INTERVAL
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NAND_CS_INTERVAL
 CS de-asserted interval between two commands
0-100ns
1-200ns
2-400ns
3-50ns

bitfields.name: xSPI_NAND_HOLD_TIME
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NAND_HOLD_TIME
Hold Time before issuing Command to FLASH
0-Wait until FLASH is idle by polling status register in the FLASH 
1-500us 
2-1ms
3 - 3ms

values.description: Wait until FLASH is idle by polling status register in the FLASH

bitfields.name: xSPI_NAND_RESET_TYPE
bitfields.description:
xSPI_NAND_RESET_TYPE
0-No reset
1-Reset the FLASH by 0xFF
2-Reset the FLASH by 0x66, 0x99
3-Reset the FLASH by dedicated Reset Pin

values.description: Reset the FLASH by dedicated Reset Pin

bitfields.name: TIMING_MODE
bitfields.description:
TIMING_MODE
000-Mode0: 10MHz
001 - Mode1: 20MHz
010 - Mode2: 28MHz
011 - Mode3: 33MHz
100 - Mode4: 40MHz
101-Mode5: 50MHz
11x - Fastest Mode

bitfields.name: BOOT_SEARCH_STRIDE
bitfields.description:
BOOT_SEARCH_STRIDE
 Search Stride for FCB and DBBT Search strides in terms of page zero - 64
other: Value = 2^(BOOT_SEARCH_STRIDE)

bitfields.name: ROW_COL_ADDR_MODE
bitfields.description:
ROW_COL_ADDR_MODE
 Applicable only for non-ONFI devices
00x - 5 bytes (CA2+RA3)
010-4 bytes (CA2+RA2)
011-3 bytes (CA2+RA1)
10x - 4 bytes (CA1+RA3)
110-3 bytes (CA1+RA2)
111 - 2 bytes (CA1+RA1)

bitfields.name: 2ND_IMG_OFFSET
bitfields.description:
2ND_IMG_OFFSET
zero - No 2nd physical image present
Otherwise -2nd physical image located at 2ND_IMG_SIZE_UNIT* 2ND_IMG_OFFSET

bitfields.name: WDOG_EN
bitfields.description:
WDOG_EN
0-Disable all WDOGs during boot
1-Keep WDOG1 enabled during boot

bitfields.name: Release_M7_RST_STAT
bitfields.description:
Release_M7_RST_STAT
0-RST assert
1-RST release (Required to access M7TCM)

bitfields.name: BOOT_FREQ
bitfields.description:
BOOT_FREQ
0-200MHz derived from RC400M
1-240MHz derived from PLL480MHz

bitfields.name: OTFAD2_KEY_SCRAMBLE_CRC_EN
bitfields.description: OTFAD2 key scramble CRC enable, write-only

bitfields.name: OTFAD1_KEY_SCRAMBLE_CRC_EN
bitfields.description: OTFAD1 key scramble CRC enable, write-only

values.name: REGULAR_TCM
values.description: REGULAR_TCM (128 kB Code TCM, 128 kB Sys TCM);
No EWM_OUT output is forced to GPIO, user should use IOMUXC to configure pinmux and select GPIO to output  EWM_OUT
EWM_OUT output is forced to GPIO_AON_27 (ALT7), GPIO_AON_27 IOMUXC control register is override and no longer works.
EWM_OUT output is forced to GPIO_AD_12 (ALT7), GPIO_AD_12 IOMUXC control register is override and no longer works.
EWM_OUT output is forced to GPIO_AD_29 (ALT7), GPIO_AD_29 IOMUXC control register is
